reviews.text: Best hotel I have ever been to! Great service, good food, and nice pools! The beach was a little deep, so we weren't there that much. We had so much fun! We will return:)
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was recently in Turkey and has lived in the sea world alanya, fantastic place to be, perfect private beach really nice and large pool for children and adults, really good food, great entertainment for children for adult who is for everyone but but when you are received by sea world receptionist really really bad service they do not really understand English and I had a problem in the room I was on the internet was not working and asked them to come up to our room they said about 5 min who did not see any I called again and they said so they will come about 10 minutes, but there was still nothing so I called two more times and still got nothing, so I had enough and phoned the travel company they contacted so sea ​​world and it helped rather not, but after four days and have tried to get them up to our room, so they finally came to see what was wrong and then we move to another room, I've never experienced anything like the a 5 star hotel, being so poor service and to sea world i hope your service will be better
reviews.title: service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went there for two weeks in March 2011. We thought the hotel was really nice. Great food, friendly service, nice room and great spa area with sauna and hammam. There is not much to see around the hotel so we recommend to do some trips around the region. There are many great things to visit. We strongly recommend that hotel, we had a great holiday there.
reviews.title: Turkey December 2011

reviews.text: Visited this hotel with a last minute deal from Thomas Cook Belgium. was great value for money.
reviews.title: Best place wewe ever been

reviews.text: The good, the bad and the ugly
reviews.title: good, bad and ugly
Hit & Miss
reviews.text: I have trying to figure out if I should give 3 or 4 points to this hotel and finally I decided to give a 3. I will begin with positive points and then things that could improve and finally finish with issues that made me give low score.

The good. The hotel is clean and nice. There are many facilities and many activities. The animation works hard. You do not really need to step outside of the hotel for anything. When asked, the staff try their best to accommodate our wishes and when something is amiss they apologize and try to remedy the issue. The hotel is cheap. Compared to the 5 star I Majorca last year we paid half the price (plane ticket included) and then our child was below two years old! The best part of the food was the eggplants. The chef is remarkable for making tasty dishes with eggplants. The dolmas were also good. The beach was clean and considerable number of sun beds on the beach with lots of shade.
reviews.title: Worthless
One of a kind- a review by a 16 year old girl
reviews.text: The bad. The food is basically Turkish. There is very little or no sea food. The cheese served at breakfast are mostly all white and all are very very very salty. I love feta cheese but I was not able to eat that cheese. Instead I used the cheese as salt in very small portions! There are not many fruits served. Turkey is renowned for its fruits. The only delicious fruit was watermelon. The melons were not sweet. No kiwi was served. Banana was severed rarely and then only green. Tomatoes and cucumber were good too though.
The room ameneties were limited but sufficient. Definitely not a 5 star quality for towels, etc.
reviews.title: Great resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice hotel, pool area fantastic! Activities throughout the day where great!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pancakes throughout the day where brilliant also!
reviews.title: If you are an elderly or a couple w/ small children you will like it-we didn't

reviews.text: Rooms very clean and modern, bed however uncomfortable.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay for everyone

reviews.text: Food was nice, a la carte restaurants where very disappointing! We actually got food poision from the chinese restaurant and couldnt eat anything for the rest of the holiday. We came back to Turkey after staying in the Porto Bello hotel as it was amazing this however didnt come close. Sad to say we will not be returning.
reviews.title: Quite a pleasant stay
